title: Bulk Grain & Corn Storage Services For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary This bulk grain storage services business is located in central North Dakota. This business stores wheat, bean, barley, flax, soybean, Canola, and corn. In addition, they also store anhydrous ammonia in bulk and have eight nurse tanks for crop dispersal. There are 14 silos of varying sizes located on eight 100' x 50' lots. This business is strategically located in the heart of the agricultural industry in North Dakota, making it an ideal location for this business. There is ample room for expansion on the property and in the services. One example, this company has direct rail access making shipping out very simple; a new owner might consider taking shipments in through this railway too! The owner is open to other offers. This grain company has been in business since 1912 with the current ownership. After years of hard work and dedication to building this business, the current owner has decided to retire and let a new owner take it to the next level. This North Dakota based business is a great opportunity to take a business that is already successful and build on that foundation to secure your future. This owner-operated business is managed in a hands-on fashion, giving the owner full control over the quality of products and the customer service provided. There is plenty of opportunity for growth in this business, with many avenues of expansion that could boost profit. This company offers a new owner a successful business with stable revenues. Equipment and inventory included in the sale, more details available upon inquiry. Asking $2,100,000. Located on 4 acres of land are 14 Silos in varied sizes. Also, 7 buildings, including three elevators, liquid fertilizer shed and a hanger used for chemicals and storage. The property includes two GT grain dryers, two grain elevators, mill elevators, propane tanks and a storage capacity of 300,000 Bushels. This property has been leased from the railroad since 1912. There is also a residence available for purchase. Financials
